name: Mr. Bean Trivia Quiz | Mr. Bean | 10 Questions

questions.text: What subject did Mr. Bean study most about for his test?
questions.explanation:
Trigonometry.

	Mr. Bean sits next to a man at the examination hall who reviewed his calculus.  Mr. Bean decides that copying off this man's test would be a good idea.

questions.text: What is one thing that Mr. Bean does not bring to his exam?
questions.explanation:
A calculator.

	A few minutes before his exam, Mr. Bean takes numerous things out of his jacket and bag, whereas everyone else takes out a pen or a pencil.  He does this to try and impress the person he is sitting beside.

questions.text: What cartoon character does Mr. Bean take out of his bag?
questions.explanation:
The Pink Panther.

	Mr. Bean stands the Pink Panther and his little stuffed doll in front of his alarm clock before he takes his exam.  He ends up trying to break his alarm clock after it goes off at the end of the exam.

questions.text: At what time does Mr. Bean's exam finish at?
questions.explanation:
Noon.

	Mr. Bean falls asleep during the exam and doesn't finish it.  When he wakes up, he realizes that he was doing the wrong worksheet.  Instead of doing trigonometry, he was doing the calculus sheet.

questions.text: Does Mr. Bean finish the exam?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Mr. Bean cries himself to sleep after he can't get the (wrong) answers off of the guy sitting beside him.  He wakes up seconds before the end of the exam.

questions.text: What coloured bathing suit does Mr. Bean try to put on at the beach?
questions.explanation:
Blue and white.

	Mr. Bean walks many steps down a cliff wall to get to the beach, so he attempts to put on his bathing suit.  What's the problem with that?  Well, a man is sitting by the water, so Mr. Bean tries to put on his bathing suit over his pants and then take the pants off.

questions.text: Does Mr. Bean ever get to wear his bathing suit?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Mr. Bean successfully gets his bathing suit on before taking his pants off, but he soon realizes that the man on the beach was blind, and he wouldn't have seen a thing anyways.  He changes at the beach because he had to walk down a large cliff to get to it and it would have been too far to walk back.

questions.text: Where does Mr. Bean end up wiping his nose at the church?
options: On the guy next to him
questions.explanation:
On his jacket pocket.

	Mr. Bean ends up sneezing during church, but he can't find any tissues, so he wipes his nose on his jacket pocket.  He ends up putting a candy in the pocket during the episode.

questions.text: What does Mr. Bean try to eat in the church?
questions.explanation:
A candy.

	While trying to hide the candy from the man seated next to him, Mr. Bean sticks the candy into his jacket pocket.  He realizes his mistake soon after.

questions.text: How many encounters does Mr. Bean have with the blue, three-wheeled car in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Four.

	The blue car is seen once before the exam, once before he gets to the beach, once in the church parking lot, and once again during the drive after church, when Mr. Bean crashes his car.  The car makes many appearances throughout the shows.
